response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I understand it might seem expensive, but I assure you it's worth every penny. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $135. This price not only reflects the true value of the product but also allows me to maintain a fair profit margin. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 135}
